items.title: Trump meets with royal family in pomp-filled state visit to Britain
items.description: The U.S. president was largely insulated from protesters in a country where he remains unpopular. He plans to meet with Prime Minister Keir Starmer on...

items.title: U.S. wins release of Wells Fargo banker placed under exit ban in China
items.description: Beijing has allowed Mao Chenyue, a bank managing director in Atlanta, to return to the United States, people familiar with the matter said.

items.title: Obama condemns ‘horrific’ Kirk shooting, urges country to unite
items.description: Former president Barack Obama called the killing of Kirk a tragedy and said the Trump administration was wrong to try and sow division after the shoot...

items.title: Brad Raffensperger, Ga. Republican who defied Trump, running for governor
items.description: The Georgia secretary of state resisted Trump’s pressure to reverse his 2020 reelection loss in Georgia.

items.title: Anti-Trump influencers flood the White House’s new TikTok account
items.description: The rocky rollout of the president’s official presence on the social platform showcases the challenges he faces among younger people online.
